awards.text: Nominated for 4 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: During World War I, an army private is accused of desertion during battle. The officer assigned to defend him at his court-martial finds out there is more to the case than meets the eye.
plot: During World War I, an army private is accused of desertion during battle. The officer assigned to defend him at his court-martial finds out there is more to the case than meets the eye.
title: King & Country
writers: John Wilson (from the stage play by)
